item.title: Chris Shiflett
item.description: Christopher Aubrey Shiflett is an American musician. He is most recognizable as the lead guitarist for the rock band Foo Fighters. He was previously a member of the punk rock bands No Use for a Name (1986-2012) and Me First and the Gimme Gimmes (1995-2019). He joined the Foo Fighters in 1999 following the release of their third album, and performed with all three bands as well as several other side projects simultaneously. He also hosts a podcast titled Walking The Floor and has released two solo albums, the most recent in 2019.
